title: Wanting To Buy 18 Polar Bear T206's
author: Ronnie73

posts.post_title: Wanting To Buy 18 Polar Bear T206's
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone, currently i'm looking to add the following 18 T206 Polar Bear Backs to my personal set. I'm looking for lower grade raw or PSA/SGC 1 to 2.5 that have very little or no paper loss, untrimmed, and no ink marks. Just looking for good honest wear. If you have something in the 3 to 4 grade range and the price is right, that might work too. You can PM me and or send me an email with scans and prices at [url]d2ad2a@aol.com[/url]

Thanks in advance for everyones help.

Polar Bear Backs Only

Abbott, Fred
Adkins, Doc
Bescher, Bob (Hands In Air)
Crandall, Doc (Portrait With Cap)
Dorner, Gus
Frill, John
Howard, Del
Hummel, John
